title: [Feature Request] Dynamic Connection Folder
author: mhudrlik
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
A folder would either automatically or manually  update the list of connections in the folder.  Active Directory and/or REST

## Current Behavior
You can manually import via file, AD or Portscan.

## Possible Solution
A flag on the folder with a setting in minutes/hours/days of how frequently to update the list, possibly by just calling the import function and overwriting the contents of the folder.  It would be nice to be able to right click and update manually as we...

iterations.description: The issue proposes a broad dynamic-folder concept but does not provide concrete, testable requirements or validated behavior on current builds.
The feature request is currently too broad and stale to implement because it lacks validated latest-build behavior and concrete acceptance criteria.
Dynamic connection folders with periodic AD/REST re-import is a valuable enterprise feature that builds on existing import infrastructure

The infrastructure for dynamic folders exists (`DynamicFolderManager`, `ContainerInfo.DynamicSource`) but currently only supports Active Directory. This feature request implies extending it to other sources (e.g., generic scripts, files, or URL) to make it truly dynamic for all users.

notes:
AI triage (codex): The issue proposes a broad dynamic-folder concept but does not provide concrete, testable requirements or validated behavior on current builds.
Approach: Request retest on v1.79.x/upstream dev plus clear use cases, data sources (SQL/AD/service discovery), refresh rules, and acceptance criteria before scoping implementation.
AI triage (codex): The feature request is currently too broad and stale to implement because it lacks validated latest-build behavior and concrete acceptance criteria.
Approach: Request a retest on v1.79.x/upstream dev with explicit requirements for dynamic folder sources, refresh rules, filtering logic, and expected UI behavior, then scope implementation from that spec.
AI triage (claude): Dynamic connection folders with periodic AD/REST re-import is a valuable enterprise feature that builds on existing import infrastructure
Approach: Add a DynamicSource property to ContainerInfo (source type, query, refresh interval), implement a background timer service that triggers re-import on schedule, extend the folder context menu with 'Configure Dynamic Source' and 'Refresh Now' options, and reuse existing AD/file importers to populate folder contents
AI triage (gemini): The infrastructure for dynamic folders exists (`DynamicFolderManager`, `ContainerInfo.DynamicSource`) but currently only supports Active Directory. This feature request implies extending it to other sources (e.g., generic scripts, files, or URL) to make it truly dynamic for all users.
Approach: Extend `DynamicSourceType` enum with new sources (e.g., `Script`, `File`). Update `DynamicFolderManager.RefreshFolderInternal` to handle these new types by invoking the appropriate importer or script parser to populate `ContainerInfo.Children`.
